descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create or Update
options.description: Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

accountName.name: accountName
accountName.description: Name of the account. If a record with this account name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
accountName.ai_hint: Name of the account. If a record with this account name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

values.name: fieldId
values.description: Custom field to set a value to

values.name: value
values.description: Value to set on custom field

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
accountId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
approved
options.description: Whether to retrieve only approved records. Defaults to true.

options.name: converted
options.description: Whether to retrieve only converted records. Defaults to false.

options.name: include_child
options.description: Whether to retrieve only records from child territories

options.name: sort_order
options.description: Ascending or descending order sort order

options.name: territory_id
options.description: Retrieve only records from this territory

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

values.name: fieldId
values.description: Custom field to set a value to

values.name: value
values.description: Value to set on custom field

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: ID of the contact to update
contactId.ai_hint: ID of the contact to update

dealName.name: dealName
dealName.description: Name of the deal. If a record with this deal name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
dealName.ai_hint: Name of the deal. If a record with this deal name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

stage.name: stage
stage.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
stage.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: ID of the deal to update
dealId.ai_hint: ID of the deal to update

subject.name: subject
subject.description: Subject or title of the sales order. If a record with this subject exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
subject.ai_hint: Subject or title of the sales order. If a record with this subject exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

Product_Details.name: Product_Details

options.name: id
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

Product_Details.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

invoiceId.name: invoiceId
invoiceId.description: ID of the invoice to update
invoiceId.ai_hint: ID of the invoice to update

Company.name: Company
Company.description: Company at which the lead works
Company.ai_hint: Company at which the lead works

leadId.name: leadId
leadId.description: ID of the lead to update
leadId.ai_hint: ID of the lead to update

productName.name: productName
productName.description: Name of the product. If a record with this product name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
productName.ai_hint: Name of the product. If a record with this product name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

productId.name: productId
productId.description: ID of the product to update
productId.ai_hint: ID of the product to update

vendorId.name: vendorId
vendorId.description: ID of the vendor to update
vendorId.ai_hint: ID of the vendor to update

purchaseOrderId.name: purchaseOrderId
purchaseOrderId.description: ID of the purchase order to update
purchaseOrderId.ai_hint: ID of the purchase order to update

quoteId.name: quoteId
quoteId.description: ID of the quote to update
quoteId.ai_hint: ID of the quote to update

salesOrderId.name: salesOrderId
salesOrderId.description: ID of the sales order to update
salesOrderId.ai_hint: ID of the sales order to update

vendorName.name: vendorName
vendorName.description: Name of the vendor. If a record with this vendor name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.
vendorName.ai_hint: Name of the vendor. If a record with this vendor name exists it will be updated, otherwise a new one will be created.

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'account' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountName'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountName'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountId'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountId'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'accountId'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'lastName'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'lastName'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'deal' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealName'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealName'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'stage'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'dealId'
IF resource == 'deal' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'invoice' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'Product_Details'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation IN ["create", "upsert"] THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'lead' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'Company'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'lastName'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'Company'

IF resource == 'lead' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
